data.title: Laboratories in compliance with the DCC standard cannabinoid test method
data.excerpt: Beginning January 1, 2024, state licensed laboratories are required to use the Department of Cannabis Controlâ€™s (DCC) standardized cannabinoids test method and standardized operating procedures for testing dried flower, including non-infused pre-rolls. The licensed laboratories below are in compliance with state law and can conduct state mandated compliance testing for dried flower, including non-infused pre-rolls. […]
